articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Sites of Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Sites of Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the construction sites of Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage.
					 Going round various places of the construction sites, he gave important instructions on the construction.
					
					 Noting the baby home and orphanage are now under construction at very good places, he underlined the need to build them as fresh icon ones in the era of the Workers' Party fully reflecting the love of the party for the younger generation and future.
					
					 He called for constructing every place of the baby home and orphanage including bedrooms at the best level, arranging outdoor and indoor swimming 
					
					pools and an amusement room in a peculiar manner and building well not only rooms for teachers but also welfare facilities.
					
					 As the children of the baby home and orphanage are babies and kindergartners, it is necessary to manufacture desks, chairs and beds to fit for their ages and mental qualities, he said, adding the party will prepare all furniture, fixtures and other household utensils required by them.
					
					 Underscoring the need to arrange well the environment of the baby home and the orphanage, he instructed officials to build a park to suit children's minds so that they may play there as they please and plant many trees of good species.
					
					 Calling for building every structure at the world level, he stressed the need for builders to make sure that the intention of the party and patriotic feeling are reflected even in a piece of brick and a shovel of mortar.
					
					 The party's purpose of building Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage as icons is to build baby homes and orphanages in each province with them as models, he noted.
					
					 Underlining the need to take good care of the orphans, the old persons without any support and the disabled, he called for making it a social trait and a tradition of the great family of the country to do so.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Army Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing 
					
					Department of the National Defence Commission.

articles.title: Pyongyang Citizens' Mass Rally Marks Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism
articles.content:
Pyongyang Citizens' Mass Rally Marks Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A mass rally of Pyongyang citizens took place at Kim Il Sung Square on the occasion of the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism which falls on today.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of the party and state, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, working people, youth and students, more than 100 000 in all. 
					
					 Also present there were overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Invited there were diplomatic envoys of different countries, representatives of international organizations, staff members of foreign embassies, military attaches corps and foreign guests here.
					
					 Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, made a speech at the rally.
					
					 He said: The U.S. imperialists ignited a war of aggression against the DPRK 64 years ago in order to stifle the young DPRK and dominate the whole world, with huge aggression troops armed with the latest weapons, south Korean puppet army and the troops of 15 satellite countries involved. They committed monstrous crimes unprecedented in human history.
					
					 However, they could not bring to their knees the army and people of the DPRK who turned out as one in the war to protect the freedom and independence of the country, national sovereignty and the gains of the revolution true to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They have gone frantic with the moves for a new war to stifle the DPRK, far from drawing a due lesson from the ignominious defeat they suffered in the Korean war.
					
					 The speaker called upon all service personnel and people to achieve the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. which lasted for several decades, accomplish the historic  cause of national reunification, step up the building of a  thriving socialist nation and thus complete  the revolutionary cause of Juche to the last.
					
					 Representatives of workers, agricultural workers and youth and students evinced their resolution to give the fullest play to the bolstered-up might of Songun and vent the pent-up resentment and thus drive the aggressors out of this land and achieve the historic cause of national reunification without fail if the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group hurt the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK even a bit.
					
					 Then followed a demonstration.
					
					  The demonstrators marched past the square, holding such placards reading "Let's force the U.S. imperialists to pay dearly for the blood shed by Koreans!" and "Let's take thousands-fold revenge upon the U.S. imperialist aggressors!"

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Evade Blame for Pushing Korean Peninsula to Constant Danger of War
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Evade Blame for Pushing Korean Peninsula to Constant Danger of War
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) --  The Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army on Wednesday released a detailed report condemning the U.S. for pushing the Korean peninsula to constant danger of a war and imposing unspeakable misfortune and pain on the Korean nation.
					 The U.S. has deliberately aggravated the situation on the peninsula by violating the Armistice Agreement, the legal mechanism to prevent the recurrence of a war, the report said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. signed the "mutual defense treaty" with the south Korean puppet forces on August 8, 1953, thus legitimizing the permanent presence of the U.S. imperialist aggressors in south Korea. This was a blatant violation of Paragraph 60 of Article 4 of the AA which calls for withdrawing all foreign forces from Korea and peacefully settling the Korean issue.
					
					 It systematically breached Paragraph 13 d which bans the introduction into Korea of all arms and equipment, Paragraph 23 of Article 2 related to activities of the mechanism for monitoring and controlling military hostilities and the relevant paragraphs of the AA which call for ceasing all hostilities against the other party.
					
					 The U.S. moves to totally scrap the AA reached an extreme phase when it let a "general" of the south Korean puppet army having neither reason nor qualifications hold the post of a senior member of the "Military Armistice Commission" in 1991.
					
					 The mechanisms to supervise the implementation of the AA which were formed according to the AA ceased to exist due to the U.S. undisguised challenge and obstructive moves.
					
					 After getting AA buried in history, the U.S. began to direct all its efforts to committing vicious military provocations to invade the DPRK.
					
					 After diverting the basic orientation of its strategy for world domination to the Asia-Pacific region in the 1990s, the U.S. set the DPRK as the primary target of its "East Asia strategy." It steadily revised and supplemented all scenarios for a war against the DPRK including OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5030 and finally round them off.
					
					 To this end, the U.S. massively reinforced latest destructive weapons targeting the DPRK, perpetrated reckless military provocations and steadily intensified large-sale war maneuvers. 
					
					 The U.S. has staged a total of at least 18 000 war maneuvers for invading the DPRK and joint military exercises in and around south Korea since the ceasefire, counting only those opened to public.
					
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula is so gravest that a nuclear war may break out any moment, the report said, and continued:
					
					 It was the period of the last Korean war that the Korean nation was exposed to the nuclear threat and blackmail for the first time.
					
					 The then war boss Truman made several attempts to drop A-bomb on the DPRK to recover from the repeated heavy setbacks in the Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. blackmailed the DPRK with nuclear bombs, threatening to reduce it to debris. This left towering grudge in the minds of Koreans. Since the end of the 1950s, the U.S. began to massively introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					
					 As early as in the 1970s the U.S. turned south Korea into the area with the biggest density in the deployment of nuclear weapons in the world.
					
					 Early in the 1980s it brought even neutron bombs to south Korea.
					
					 After turning south Korea into the world's biggest outpost for nuclear attack and nuclear arsenal, the U.S. worked desperately to use those nuclear weapons with various missions in fighting a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 Focus Retina, Freedom Bolt, Team Spirit, RSOI, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle, Ulji Freedom Guardian and all other joint military exercises which it has staged so far since the 1960s were all aimed to bolster the actual nuclear war capabilities in south Korea.
					
					 In fact, the U.S. attempted the direct use of nuclear weapons, while openly designating the DPRK, the non-nuclear state, as a target of a preemptive nuclear attack on several occasions. 
					
					 In the "quadrennial defense strategy review report" the U.S. defined the DPRK as "state posing direct threat" and the "biggest rival" and blustered that in case its "deterrence strategy" fails, it will contain the DPRK by use of nuclear force. This revealed to what reckless phase its ambition to stifle the DPRK with nukes has reached.
					
					 Obama in a recent public appearance did not utter even a word about the moves of the U.S. as the arch criminal who spawned the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula and posed  the nuclear threat and blackmail but let loose a whole string of provocative outbursts that he would continue to pressurize the north to denuclearize, while groundlessly taking issue with the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK. This once again revealed its attempt to persist in the moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 After the armistice mechanism became defunct, there took place hundreds of big and small talks and contacts including 16 rounds of general-level talks and more than 200 rounds of colonel-level working talks between the DPRK and the U.S. But no progress was made in the discussions on matters of establishing a new peace-keeping mechanism due to the deliberate and unjustifiable behavior of the U.S. forces side.
					
					 Only merciless punishment and fist, not word, will work on the U.S. as it regards aggression and war as the mode of its existence.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are waiting for the moment to settle accounts with the U.S. which posed constant nuclear war threat to the Korean peninsula and imposed untold misfortune and sufferings on it.

articles.title: National Peace Committee of Korea Denounces U.S., Puppet S. Korea as Provokers of last Korean War
articles.content:
National Peace Committee of Korea Denounces U.S., Puppet S. Korea as Provokers of last Korean War 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement Wednesday said the Korean war of aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces was the thrice-cursed crime.
					 On June 25, 1950 the U.S. imperialists instigated traitor Syngman Rhee to launch a surprise invasion against the DPRK and killed Koreans by the most cruel means and methods and reduced this land to debris, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 More than 1.2 million guiltless peaceable civilians were massacred in cold blood by barbarous man-killers hell-bent on aggression and man-hunting and mountains and rivers were drenched with human blood. Planes of the U.S. imperialist aggressors indiscriminately dropped nearly 600 000 tons of bombs and napalm bombs on areas of the DPRK, reducing them to such horrible ashes that not a single house and a piece of brick were left undestroyed.
					
					 Human history records the cruelest and the most shuddering crimes committed by the Hitler fascist junta during the Second World War but the atrocities perpetrated by the Yankee imperialists during the Korean war put the Hitler fascists into the shade in brutality, cruelty and barbarity. 
					
					 But the aggressors could not bring to their knees the heroic people who turned out in do-or-die resistance to defend the sovereignty of the country. Finally, they were compelled to sign the document of surrender before the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have worked more desperately to ignite a new war in order to realize their scenario of aggression against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from the shameful defeat they sustained in the war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their lackeys south Korean military gangsters are staging farces of extolling to the sky their war crimes, describing the last Korean war as "the war which checked the north's southward invasion." 
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south should courageously turn out in a sacred battle to deal sledge hammer blows at those enemies keen to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to the land.
					
					 The UN and other international organizations and the world peace-loving people should clearly understand who the arch criminal harassing peace on the Korean peninsula is and resolutely shatter the warmongers' reckless attempt to ignite a war of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces should not run amuck, clearly mindful of the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the second Korean war.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Blasts U.S. Moves to Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Blasts U.S. Moves to Hurt Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement Wednesday:
					 The enemies have gone beyond the tolerance limit in their despicable moves to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 A preview of a film on insulting and assassinating the supreme leadership of the DPRK is floating in broad daylight in the U.S., a kingpin of international terrorism and its cesspool, shocking the world community.
					
					 The U.S. has gone reckless in such provocative hysteria as bribing a rogue movie maker to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. This act of not fearing any punishment from Heaven is touching off the towering hatred and wrath of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The above-said practice is, however, a revelation of its fear as it is taken aback by the bright and rosy future of the DPRK under the leadership of the peerless great man and a last-ditch effort of those who are seized by a daydream.
					
					 Absolutely intolerable is the distribution of such film in the U.S. as it is the most undisguised terrorism and a war action to deprive the service personnel and people of the DPRK of their mental mainstay and bring down its social system.
					
					 The dignified and worthwhile life the Korean people enjoy at present and the great changes taking place in the country as well as everything valuable that will belong to the rosy future when the dreams and ideals of the people will come true would be unthinkable apart from the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 That's why they regard the supreme leadership as dearer than their own lives.
					
					 It is their firm determination and stamina to mercilessly destroy anyone who dares hurt or attack the supreme leadership of the country even a bit.
					
					 Those who defamed our supreme leadership and committed the hostile acts against the DPRK can never escape the stern punishment to be meted out according to a law wherever they might be in the world.
					
					 If the U.S. administration connives at and patronizes the screening of the film, it will invite a strong and merciless countermeasure.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Raps Sophism of Park Geun Hye to Justify Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Raps Sophism of Park Geun Hye to Justify Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea in a recent "dialogue for unification" with overseas advisory members blustered that "peace on the Korean peninsula is still a long way to go as long as the north continues developing nuclear weapons and making provocations" and "if the north sincerely wants economic development and improvement of the people's living, it should discontinue nuclear development and provocations, to begin with".
					 This is sophism of the Park group to justify its despicable act of depending on foreign forces and its policy of escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, and tide over the ever-worsening ruling crisis.
					
					 The Park group is the chief culprit disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula as it is bringing the dark cloud of a war to hang over the peninsula while ceaselessly staging large-scale nuclear war exercises against the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 After taking office the Park group has launched nuclear war maneuvers against the north in south Korea in league with foreign forces. It has recently sent the puppet army units to the U.S. mainland for war maneuvers for aggression.
					
					 It has gone so reckless as to tighten conspiratorial nexus with foreign forces to invade the north under the pretext of the non-existent "nuclear threat from the north".
					
					 Shortly ago, military hooligans of south Korea, the U.S. and Japan were closeted with each other in Singapore under the pretext of "coping with the north's nukes" at which they talked about "close cooperation" and "sharing of information about nuclear threat".
					
					 No sooner had the high-level tripartite military talks ended than the puppet group invited U.S. military warmongers to south Korea to have a confab to extend again the transfer of the right to command the wartime operation, clamoring about "nuclear and missile threat from the north".
					
					 Shelving its own moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north, the Park group is claiming that the prospect for peace on the Korean peninsula is becoming gloomy due to the "nuclear development and provocation of the north". This is a height of shamelessness.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the DPRK's measure of bolstering nuclear deterrence is a very justifiable step for self-defence to protect the sovereignty of the country and nation from the U.S. nuclear war threat and achieve the prosperity of all generations to come.
					
					 Now that the U.S. keeps its forces in the south of the Korean peninsula and is posing a nuclear threat to the DPRK, and the south Korean puppet forces, the war servants of the U.S., are pushing the situation to the brink of war, while kowtowing to it, the DPRK will further bolster up its deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 No matter what others may say, the DPRK will counter the sword of the enemy with long sword and rifle with gun. This mode of counteraction for self-defence will never change.
					
					 The Park group would be well advised not to talk about the DPRK's nuclear development and "threat" but to remove the threat of a nuclear war against the north posed by foreign forces.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Total Failure of Park's Personnel Affair
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Total Failure of Park's Personnel Affair 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime's moves to reinforce its ruling mechanism are being criticized by the people as a total failure of personnel affair.
					 An Tae Hui whom the puppet group designated as a candidate to replace former "Prime Minister" Jong Hong Won, who fell victim to the ferry Sewol sinking disaster, was compelled to withdraw his candidacy just six days later without having a chance to stand before the "National Assembly" confirmation hearing due to the scandal in which he illegally accumulated 1.6 billion won. Mun Chang Guk who was designated to succeed him also dropped out.
					
					 This is a deserved punishment meted out by the times and the public mindset to the Cabinet reshuffle which Park Geun Hye staged, talking about "state reform" and "personnel reshuffle".
					
					 Through the recent Cabinet reshuffle Park sought to revive all the fascist ruling mechanisms including the puppet government, National Assembly and military and consolidate the fascist dictatorial ruling foundation with ultra-right confrontation elements.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin, boss of military gangsters whom Park appointed to the post of the chief of the security office of Chongwadae, and Han Min Gu, puppet minister of National Defense, a belligerent element who inherited the blood of pro-Japanese lackey, are all ultra-right conservative figures, a clear indication of the reactionary nature of the "personnel reshuffle" of Chongwadae.
					
					 Park designated Mun Chang Guk as the candidate for "prime minister". This drove the political situation in south Korea into a bottomless abyss of ruin.
					
					 Mun described the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and the national division as the "providence of God" and denied the June 15 joint declaration. He is a diehard confrontation fanatic who dared slander and hurt the dignity and the social system in the DPRK, crying out for the theory of south Korea's "nuclear weaponization" and "theory of overthrowing the social system in the north". 
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life labeled him "another Ri Wan Yong" and "worst traitor", saying that "Park who is unfit for president designated such a guy as prime minister". This is a harsh criticism of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Park Geun Hye blustered that "this can be understood from the Christian viewpoint" in a bid to press for the appointment of "prime minister". Emboldened by the connivance of Chongwadae, Mun Chang Guk behaved so arrogantly as to deceive the public by making apology and expressing regret over his reckless remarks.
					
					 However, history meted out a stern punishment to him.
					
					 As candidates for the puppet prime minister dropped out one by one, the Park Geun Hye regime came under public fire.
					
					 The south Koreans made the worst estimation of the Park's regime, terming the recent "personnel reshuffle" a "result of arrogance and self-complacency in defiance of the public mindset". 
					
					 Traitor Park is fated to meet only grudge and punishment by the people as she shields the group of traitors who are all the same in their sycophantic and treacherous nature and anti-national and anti-reunification acts.
					
					 Under the present puppet regime keen on inter-Korean confrontation, the people will never pardon the confrontation maniacs who make desperate efforts to deprive them even of their right to existence through moves for a war against the north while imposing misfortune and disaster upon them.
					
					 Chongwadae should be mindful that today just a few puppet figures were punished by the nation but tomorrow its whole staff will be brought to a court.   
					
					 The puppet forces resort to all sorts of vicious political hooliganism to tide over the worsening ruling crisis and stay in power but their political ruin is inevitable.

articles.title: Greetings to Madagascan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Madagascan President
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday sent a message of greetings to Heri Rajaonarimampianina, president of Madagascar, on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop.
					
					 It wished the president and people of Madagascar success in the work for the stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Mozambican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mozambican President
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Armando Emilio Guebuza, president of Mozambique, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely wishing the president and people of Mozambique bigger success in the work for the stability of the country and its economic development.

articles.title: Greetings to Slovenian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Slovenian FM
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Karl Erjavec, deputy prime minister and foreign minister of Slovenia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow strong in mutual interests.

articles.title: Medical Stone Beverage Popular among DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Medical Stone Beverage Popular among DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Stalls serving Kumgang medical stone beverage have recently appeared in scores of parts of Pyongyang, gaining popularity among citizens.
					 In this regard, Mun Sun Yong, head of the Kumgang medical stone beverage workteam, told KCNA:
					
					 The Kumgang medical stone contains tens of essential microelements and rare-earth elements and adsorbs pathogenic germs and deleterious heavy metals.
					
					 The beverage based on this stone proves efficacious in the prevention of mineral deficiency and the treatment of digestive trouble, heart disorders, diabetes, neuralgia and dermatosis and softens skin.
					
					 Its users are unanimous in saying that the beverage has a good effect on various kinds of diseases. 
					
					 The demand for it is growing among DPRK people.

articles.title: Young People and Students Vow to Take Revenge on U.S. Imperialists
articles.content:
Young People and Students Vow to Take Revenge on U.S. Imperialists
 Kaesong, June 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting of young people and students to vow to take revenge on the U.S. imperialists took place at the plaza in Kaesong City on June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists.
					 Present there were officials concerned, young people and students in Kaesong City.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers denounced the U.S. imperialists who provoked the Korean war on June 25, 1950. 
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists hurled into the war huge aggression forces, south Korean puppet army and troops of 15 satellite countries, reduced everything in Korea to ashes and committed brutal atrocities unprecedented in the human history of wars.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK, rallied close around President Kim Il Sung, turned out to shatter the U.S. myth of being the "strongest" and displayed the mettle of heroic Korea before the world.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War young people and students volunteered to the front earlier than others and made great contributions to bringing earlier the V-day by fighting heroically against the aggressors and class enemies in the fierce battles.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have waged ceaseless nuclear war exercises against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from their graceful defeat, pushing the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and their followers ignite a war at last, the army and people of the DPRK will drive the aggressors out of Korea and achieve the historic cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Letter of Understanding on DPRK English Teaching and Teacher Training Programme Signed
articles.content:
Letter of Understanding on DPRK English Teaching and Teacher Training Programme Signed 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The letter of understanding on the DPRK English teaching and teacher training programme was signed here on Wednesday. 
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were officials of the education field, teachers of universities, colleges and middle schools in Pyongyang and from the British side the director of the British Council, British guest teachers and the British ambassador to the DPRK and embassy officials.

articles.title: Plasma Seed Disinfector Newly Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Plasma Seed Disinfector Newly Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Laser Institute of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has recently developed a plasma seed disinfector.
					 The disinfector is very effective in encouraging the germination of seed and disinfecting it. 
					
					 The disinfector is gaining popularity among users as it increases the rate of germination of disinfected seed by 5-10 percent with higher yield and needs no chemical agents.

articles.title: Russian Central Military Orchestra Arrives Here
articles.content:
Russian Central Military Orchestra Arrives Here 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of Russia led by Chief Conductor Valery Khalilov, head of the military-orchestra service of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, arrived here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Russian Military Orchestra
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Russian Military Orchestra
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of Russia visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday.
					 The guests laid a floral basket before the statues of the peerless great men who made undying contributions to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Religious Organizations of S. Korea Publish Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
Religious Organizations of S. Korea Publish Declaration on Situation 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Association of Buddhist Priests for Realizing Buddhism, the Round Buddhist Association for Teaching Social Changes, the Pastors' Council for Realizing Justice and Peace of south Korea and the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice, organizations of four religious orders of south Korea, held a press conference in Seoul on June 23 at which they made public a declaration on the situation denouncing the unpopular rule of the authorities. 
					 The declaration said that people in south Korea live in the era when pursuance of peace and happiness is regarded as a crime. 
					
					 The "government" which caused the disaster of the ferry Sewol sinking is still blaming others. 
					
					 What is more deplorable is the chief executive's arbitrary and self-righteous practices and incapability. 
					
					 The repressive politics of the "government" endangers peace and security of the people. 
					
					 The declaration urged Park Geun Hye to stop her self-righteous state administration characterized by lack of understanding and arbitrary practices.
					
					 It also demanded she give answer to the question why the "government" failed to rescue children during the ferry Sewol sinking and stop de-nationalization. 
					
					 It also called for severely rebuking Kim Ki Chun, chief of staff of Chongwadae, as he is responsible for the failed personnel affairs and withdrawing the unreasonable designation of candidates. 
					
					 Noting that all the people crave for justice in tears, the declaration said they would turn out in actions in protest against the south Korean society where injustice prevails after Park came to power. 
					
					 It declared they will not yield to any violence of the "government" threatening democracy, the existence of the people, justice and peace.

articles.title: Lifting of Embargo on Entry of Mangyongbong-92 into Japanese Port Demanded
articles.content:
Lifting of Embargo on Entry of Mangyongbong-92 into Japanese Port Demanded
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) visited the Kyoto branch of the Japan Red Cross Society on June 17 demanding the lifting of the embargo on the entry of Mangyongbong-92 into a Japanese port, according to Choson Sinbo, the organ of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					 Many Koreans are eagerly longing for the entry of Mangyongbong-92 into a Japanese port, they said.
					
					 Compatriots visiting the homeland by plane have to bear huge financial burdens and the aged travelers, in particular, suffer pains, they noted.
					
					 Mangyongbong-92 is the most important means linking Koreans in Japan with their homeland, they said.
					
					 They requested the Kyoto branch of the Japan Red Cross Society to propose its head office to allow the ship's entry to a Japanese port in view of humanitarianism in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental talks held in late May.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked at Korea University
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Marked at Korea University
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- There took place an event at Korea University under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, according to Choson Sinbo, the organ of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon.
					 A seminar on reunification was held on June 16 under the sponsorship of the group for the study of the issue of national reunification of the university.
					
					 Present there were students and teachers of the university.
					
					 Speakers explained the contents of the joint declaration and referred to the significance of its adoption and its validity and vitality.
					
					 They highly praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for clearly indicating the way of national reunification and wisely leading the work to carry it out.
					
					 They laid bare the reactionary and crafty nature of the Park Geun Hye group's anti-reunification policy.
					
					 Other speakers said the Korean students in Japan should deeply understand the importance of reunification and discharge their role in the reunification movement.
					
					 They called upon all to get united and restore the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 A June 15 cultural event on the theme of "Let's picture to ourselves! Reunified country to be brought by us!" was held on June 19.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Brands U.S. as Unequal Society
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Brands U.S. as Unequal Society 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Korean scholar Sonu Hakwon in the U.S. released a commentary on June 18 in denunciation of the U.S. where the rich get ever richer and the poor get ever poorer. 
					 The commentary said that the U.S. is the country with the most widening gap between the rich and the poor in the world and its society is an unequal one. 
					
					 Health care and insurance in the U.S. is the worst in the world and its people have to pay the highest medical expenses while the average life expectancy and children mortality are also all-time high, it said, and went on:
					
					 The ruling quarters reduced taxes of the rich while cutting down aid to the unemployed and the extremely poor people. 
					
					 Consequently, the properties of the rich are steadily swelling while the ordinary people are driven into ever appalling poverty.  
					
					 The commentary deplored that there is no democracy in the unequal American society. 
					
					 The U.S. is now repudiated and censured by the international community due to its wrong foreign policy and the public at home is growing increasingly discontent with the serious social inequality, it stressed.

articles.title: Service Personnel Vow to Take Revenge on U.S. Imperialists, S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
Service Personnel Vow to Take Revenge on U.S. Imperialists, S. Korean Puppet Forces
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army held a meeting before the graves of 400 mothers and 102 children in the Sinchon Museum in South Hwanghae Province on Wednesday not to forget the monstrous crimes committed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemies of the Korean people, and the south Korean puppet group of traitors and force them to pay a thousand-fold price.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, service personnel of the army, navy and air and anti-air force of the KPA and students of revolutionary schools.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the graves and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 In an agitation poem "Sinchon waits for revenge" the performers said that Sinchon is waiting for a thousand-fold revenge.
					
					 Ju Sang Won, lecturer at the Sinchon Museum who narrowly survived the massacre in the powder store, and Ri In Hwa residing in neighborhood unit No. 52 of Sinchon County township condemned the enemies for ruthlessly killing innocent people and eagerly asked the service personnel to give vent to the bitter grudge of Sinchon a thousand times.
					
					 Service personnel renewed their determination to hold more tightly their arms for revenge and wipe out the enemies to the last man and force them to pay a ten thousand-fold price for the blood shed by the people of Sinchon if they come in attack.
					
					 A resolution "Army of Mt. Paektu declares" was read out at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants went round the museum.
					
					 A live bullet firing was held by service personnel in Sinchon that day.
					
					 They fully demonstrated their excellent marksmanship they have acquired through the movement for becoming crack shots in the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas conducted training in Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Protest against Japan's Moves for Reinvasion Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest against Japan's Moves for Reinvasion Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Movement for Reunified Korean Nation in south Korea held a press conference outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on June 24 at which it declared the one-million citizens action against Japan's distortion of history and rearmament.
					 At the press conference the organization accused Japan of trying to rewrite the Peace Constitution in the wake of denying the Kono statement.
					
					 Japan's moves to promote and allow the "right to collective self-defense" will result in bringing history back to the war era and paving the way for the "Self-Defense Forces" landing  on the Korean peninsula, it charged, and went on:
					
					 The conclusion of a military agreement with Japan amounts to giving a pretext for the promotion of Japan's "right to collective self-defense" and rearmament.
					
					 It called upon the peace-loving people to turn out in the one-million citizens' action.
					
					 It declared it would take the lead in the action to prevent Japan from distorting history, rearming itself and reinvading other countries.  Then members of the organization started a signature campaign.

articles.title: University Student-Media Persons Denounce Authorities' Press Censorship in S. Korea
articles.content:
University Student-Media Persons Denounce Authorities' Press Censorship in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Forum of University Media Persons  made up of student-media persons across south Korea held a press conference in Seoul and made public a declaration on the situation denouncing the authorities' press censorship on June 19. 
					 The cause of the ferry Sewol sinking has not yet been disclosed though two months have passed since the disaster, the declaration said, and went on:
					
					 The authorities are gagging the people who raise reasonable suspicions and taking away reporters covering candlelight actions and suppressing media to stop people from getting access to truth. 
					
					 Media are zealously sidestepping actions criticizing the "government" and taking issue with its rescue system and placing deeper trust in the announcement of the authorities than in the voices of the bereaved families and the truth behind the case and focusing efforts on patronizing the Park Geun Hye regime. 
					
					 Consequently, media sank in the wake of the ferry Sewol. The Park Geun Hye regime's press censorship was behind the false reporting disaster. 
					
					 Chongwadae issued an instruction to the media to refrain from criticizing the Maritime Police as regards the disaster and Park Geun Hye is letting conservative media persons hold important government posts. 
					
					 The declaration demanded Park Geun Hye take responsibility for the disaster, stop control over media and withdraw at once the unreasonable disciplinary actions against conscientious media persons.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Victory in War Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Victory in War Praised
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Wednesday carry editorials 64 years since the U.S. imperialists egged traitor Syngman Rhee clique on to ignite a war against the north. 
					 The Korean war between the only two-year old DPRK and the U.S. imperialists which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and their 15 satellite countries including the south Korean puppet army was the greatest one unprecedented in history in its intensity and fierceness, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists thoughtlessly started the war despising the army and people of the DPRK and suffered the most disgraceful defeat in history and began to go downhill. 
					
					 The historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was the brilliant victory of the unique military idea and the Juche-oriented war method of President Kim Il Sung and the victory of ardent patriotism, spirit of defending the country and indomitable fighting spirit of the army and people who turned out in the war to defend the precious motherland in hearty response to the call of the President. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung victoriously led the grim war, saved the country and people from the life-and-death crisis and opened up a new era of prosperity on this land. His exploits will shine forever along with the history of the country. 
					
					 Though more than six decades have passed since the ceasefire, the Korean peninsula has always been exposed to the danger of a war due to the continuous moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers to ignite a war against the north, the paper stresses, calling for turning out as one in the nationwide patriotic struggle to frustrate the rackets of the U.S. and its stooges aimed to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and ignite a war against it. 
					
					 Minju Joson says the Fatherland Liberation War proved that the main factor of the war victory is not numerical and technical advantages but politico-ideological advantages and strategic and tactical upper-hand of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Personage of Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Personage of Mongolia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's life was the great one devoted to the struggle for the people's happiness and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					 L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the Mongolian committee for remembering the President held on June 19.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the Juche idea founded by the President are being clearly demonstrated today when the aspiration of progressive mankind to take the road of independence is growing stronger, the chairman noted.
					
					 The great feats the President performed for the Korean people and progressive mankind will be everlasting, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia on its website on June 19.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their life.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks to firmly defend their ideas and feats and add eternal brilliance to them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Angola
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- An Angolan committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 17.
					 Domingos Coelho Da Cruz, chairman of the League of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity among Peoples, and its vice-chairman were elected honorary chairman and chairman of the committee respectively.
					
					 It decided to arrange political and cultural events such as round-table talks and film show praising the feats of the President to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 19.
					 L. Khaisandai, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to arrange political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President till July 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Russia on June 20.
					 V. V. Grishkov, first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 It decided to arrange political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- There took place in Romania, India, Indonesia and Malaysia from June 14 to 17 seminars on feats of leader Kim Jong Il to mark the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania in his report said that the WPK could advance along the road of victory and prosperity thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il although socialism collapsed in some countries in the late last century, and it could also become a beacon of hope for all the progressive political parties in the world.
					
					 The feats he performed in the party-building will always be remembered by the world progressives, the chairman noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India in his speech said that the greatest of the party-building feats of Kim Jong Il was that he strengthened the WPK into an ideologically integral whole and the party which realized the firm unity and cohesion.
					
					 Another party-building feat he performed was that he strengthened the WPK into the mother party serving the people, the chairman said, adding: His party-building feats will always shine along with socialist Korea winning victory after victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Political Parties of Russia, Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Political Parties of Russia, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Russia and Indonesia praised the exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed in building the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia in an article posted on its website on June 15 noted:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, 1964.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the WPK developed into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions.
					
					 It is a valuable fruition of his extraordinary insight, principled and resolute political decision and experienced leadership that the organizational and ideological unity and cohesion of the WPK centred on the leader have been further consolidated.
					
					 He made sure that the WPK raised a fierce wind of ideological revolution and thus brought up all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to be the ones strong in idea and faith and spirit. This has fully ensured the invincibility of the DPRK.
					
					 The Diversity Party of Indonesia in an article it contributed to the newspaper Republika noted the distinguished exploit he performed in building the WPK was that he built it into the genuine mother party serving the people.
					
					 His exploits will shine long along with the ever-victorious WPK, the article added.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries in the period between June 5 and 17 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included round-table talks in Brazil, Austria and Vietnam and reading sessions in Nigeria and Angola.
					
					 The vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil said that the WPK strengthened into an ever-victorious steel-strong party under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Personages of the Vienna, 21 County Committee of the Communist Party of Austria said the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in building the WPK will always be remembered by all the Korean people.
					
					 The curator of Ho Chi Minh Museum of Vietnam said Kim Jong Il performed undying exploits by leading the WPK for almost half a century.
					
					 A message of greeting to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at an event held in Austria.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place in the DR Congo, Guinea, Algeria and Thailand on June 16 and 17 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Films shown included Korean film "Korean People's Army, Steel-strong Ranks".
					
					 The acting general secretary of the People's Revolutionary Party of the DR Congo in a speech said it would be unthinkable without the exploits of Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into the one successfully carrying out its mission and role that the DPRK has successfully pushed forward the building of a thriving nation despite the vicious moves of the imperialists.
					
					 The chief of the Educational Department of Dubreka City of Guinea said epoch-making innovations have been made in the DPRK one after another since Kim Jong Il started his work at the C.C., WPK.
					
					 The directors of companies of Thailand said Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to developing the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power, adding that the films helped them more keenly realize his greatness.
					
					 A message of greetings to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the film show held in the DR Congo.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place in the DR Congo, Guinea, Algeria and Thailand on June 16 and 17 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Films shown included Korean film "Korean People's Army, Steel-strong Ranks".
					
					 The acting general secretary of the People's Revolutionary Party of the DR Congo in a speech said it would be unthinkable without the exploits of Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into the one successfully carrying out its mission and role that the DPRK has successfully pushed forward the building of a thriving nation despite the vicious moves of the imperialists.
					
					 The chief of the Educational Department of Dubreka City of Guinea said epoch-making innovations have been made in the DPRK one after another since Kim Jong Il started his work at the C.C., WPK.
					
					 The directors of companies of Thailand said Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to developing the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power, adding that the films helped them more keenly realize his greatness.
					
					 A message of greetings to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the film show held in the DR Congo.

articles.title: Organizations of Koreans in China Denounce U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces for Provoking 1950 Korean War
articles.content:
Organizations of Koreans in China Denounce U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces for Provoking 1950 Korean War
 Beijing, June 23 (KCNA) -- The Zhongnan Regional Association and the Beijing City Branch of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Korean Youth in China released a joint statement on June 23 disclosing and denouncing the atrocities perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces, provocateurs of the Korean war.
					 The statement said the past Korean war was, in every respect, a war of aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists to dominate the whole Korean peninsula and reduce the Korean people to slaves.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique can never evade the responsibility for the Korean war well known for its aggressive and brutal nature no matter how much water flows under the bridge, it noted.
					
					 It denounced the U.S. for having posed a threat to the Korean nation by ceaselessly staging war drills targeting the DPRK, far from drawing a bitter lesson from its ignominious defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 It is a firm will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and overseas Koreans to show what a real war is like by mobilizing all the military capabilities for self-defence which they have bolstered up for decades under the banner of Songun once the U.S. imperialist aggressors ignite another war of aggression against the DPRK, it said, stressing:
					
					 All the Koreans in China will more dynamically conduct a just and patriotic campaign to realize the reunification of the country under the unfurled banner of By Our Nation Itself, united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work off Press in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work off Press in Spain
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Aufer Publishing House of Spain on June 18.
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies that only when the DPRK defends President Kim Il Sung's Juche-based state-building idea and feats and add eternal brilliance to them, can it always demonstrate its invincible might.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige campos de construccion de hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige campos de construccion de hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno los campos de construccion del hospicio y el orfanato de Pyongyang.
					 Recorrio varios puntos de campos de construccion, donde dio preciosas instrucciones que sirven de guia en la construccion.
					
					 Diciendo que son muy apropiados los sitios en que se levantan dicho hospicio y orfanato, subrayo que deben construirlos como edificios arquitectonicos ejemplares de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo que materialicen estrictamente el amor del partido a las generaciones venideras y al futuro.
					
					 Dio orden de construir en nivel mejor todos los elementos inclusive los dormitorios, acondicionar con particularidad arquitectonica las piscinas al aire libre y bajo techo, salas de juegos, habitaciones de criaderas y 
					
					 educadoras e instalaciones de servicio publico.
					
					 Al decir que las mesas, sillas y camas deben ser elaboradas conforme a las caracteristicas psicologicas y de edad porque los huerfanos del hospicio y el orfanato son integrantes de casa-cuna y de jardin de la infancia, senalo que el partido enviara todos muebles, utensilios y otras necesidades.
					
					 Subrayando la necesidad de arreglar bien los alrededores del hospicio y del orfanato, indico acondicionar el parque conforme a la psicologia infantil y plantar muchos arboles de buenas especies.
					
					 Recalco que lo todo a ser construido por nosotros debe ser de nivel mundial y agrego que para ese efecto, los constructores deben guardar en el corazon la voluntad del partido y el patriotismo.
					
					 Enfatizo que el objetivo del partido es construirlos excelentemente y tomandolos por ejemplo, acondicionar los otros de todas las provincias.
					
					 Insistiendo en atender bien a los huerfanos y los ancianos que no tienen familiares y a los discapacitados, destaco que eso debe ser un estilo social y la tradicion de gran familia del pais.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC denuncia acto provocativo de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC denuncia acto provocativo de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 25 la siguiente declaracion:
					 Las cobardes maniobras de los enemigos tendentes a manchar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC pasan el limite y se cometen en la extremada etapa criminal.
					
					 La sociedad internacional se consterna ante la realidad en que en Estados Unidos, caudillo del terrorismo internacional, se divulga abiertamente el anuncio previo de la pelicula con el contenido de insultar y asesinar la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					 Tales imprudentes tentativas provocativas de EE.UU. que se atreve a atacar a la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC instigando a un empresario de pelicula gangsteril, causan la vehemente indignacion e ira del ejercito y pueblo coreanos.
					
					 El proceder de EE.UU. es el reflejo del temor por el radiante futuro de la RPDC guiada por el gran hombre sin igual y no pasa de ser esfuerzos agonicos de los enloquecidos por la ilusion vana. 
					
					 La proyeccion de la pelicula que demuestra abiertamente el intento de danar a nuestra Direccion Suprema es un intolerable acto terrorista y de guerra mas abierta tendente a eliminar el pilar del alma de nuestro ejercito y pueblo y derrocar el regimen de la RPDC. 
					
					 Son inimaginables al margen de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC la digna y orgullosa vida del pueblo coreano, los grandes cambios que se registran en nuestro pais y lo todo precioso del futuro maravilloso en que se haran realidad el sueno e ideal del pueblo. 
					
					 Es por eso que el ejercito y pueblo coreanos consideran mas valiosa que su vida a la Direccion Suprema. 
					
					 Los militares y civiles coreanos tienen la firme decision y temperamento de aniquilar indiscriminadamente a quienes insultan o intentan calumniar aun en lo minimo su Direccion Suprema 
					
					 Los criminales, que insultaron esta vez nuestra Direccion Suprema y cometieron los actos hostiles anti-RPDC, no podran evadir el castigo severo en virtud de la ley, aunque esten en cualquier rincon de nuestro planeta. 
					
					 Si la administracion estadounidense tolera y ampara la proyeccion de tal filme, se tomaran las contramedidas rotundas y despiadadas merecidas.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia alboroto conflictivo anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia alboroto conflictivo anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en visperas del 25 de junio, la banda titere surcoreana se enfrasca en la campana conflictiva contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 24 una declaracion.
					 La banda titere surcoreana invito a los mercenarios de EE.UU. y otros paises satelites y hasta a los jovenes surcoreanos bajo el vistoso rotulo de inauguracion del "acto de defensa de la patria", la "invitacion a los soldados participantes en la guerra" y la "ceremonia en conmemoracion de combate" para inculcar la idea de servilismo proyanqui y la confrontacion fratricida, mientras desarrolla acaloradamente los ejercicios de guerra de agresion  a la RPDC en contubernio con EE.UU.
					
					 Asi inicia la declaracion y continua:
					
					 Esto es un intento para ocultar su crimen de guerra al imputar a la RPDC la culpabilidad de provocacion de guerra del 25 de junio y para desatar una nueva guerra coreana en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 El alboroto conflictivo anti-RPDC y las maniobras belicas del imperialismo norteamericano y la banda titere surcoreana son burla a la justicia y la verdad historica y provocacion y desafio imperdonables a la RPDC.
					
					 Quienes no lanzaban ni una palabra sobre la guerra coreana por su derrota vergonzosa diciendo que es una "guerra olvidada", "conmemoran" ahora el 25 de junio hablando de la "victoria", lo que siendo tragicomedia provoca la ironia de todo el mundo.
					
					 Por mas que se desesperen tanto, el imperialismo norteamericano y la banda titere nunca podran encubrir su faz verdadera de agresores y provocadores y sus maniobras conflictivas anti-RPDC les traeran solo la derrota amarga.
					
					 Si ellos desatan por fin la guerra olvidando las lecciones amargas de la historia, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea les eliminaran de esta tierra con los fusiles del Songun, descargando el rencor y colera arraigados y lograran sin falta la causa historica de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom publica informacion detallada
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom publica informacion detallada
 Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- La Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 25 una informacion detallada para revelar a plena luz y denunciar las maniobras criminales de Estados Unidos que llevo la Peninsula Coreana a la crisis perenne de guerra e impuso a la nacion coreana incontables desgracias y penalidades.
					 La nota recuerda primero el hecho de que EE.UU. destruyo el sistema de armisticio, aparato legal para prevenir el otro desencadenamiento de guerra, empeorando asi intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 El pais norteamericano firmo el 8 de agosto de 1953 con los titeres surcoreanos el "Pacto de defensa mutua", de manera que legalizo el estacionamiento perpetuo de las tropas agresoras estadounidenses en el Sur de Corea, subraya la nota y continua:
					
					 Esto es la destruccion abierta de la clausula 60 del articulo cuarto del acuerdo de armisticio que estipula retirar de Corea a todos los ejercitos extranjeros y solucionar de manera pacifica el problema de Corea.
					
					 EE.UU. violo de modo sistematico el parrafo Ch de la clausula 13 que estipula la prohibicion de la introduccion de todos los armamentos de la fuera de Corea, la clausula 23 de articulo segundo relacionada con las actividades del organismo que inspecciona y controla los actos hostiles militares y otros articulos correspondientes del acuerdo de armisticio que estipulan prohibir todas las hostilidades a su contraparte.
					
					 A fin de eliminar totalmente el Acuerdo de Armisticio, en 1991 EE.UU. nombro a un "general" del ejercito titere del Sur de Corea, carente de obligacion y calificacion, como jefe de la Comision del Acuerdo de Armisticio Militar.
					
					 Los organismos de inspeccion de armisticio, organizados segun el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea, terminaron su existencia debido al desafio abierto y el impedimento de EE.UU.
					
					 Tras destruir el Acuerdo de Armisticio, EE.UU. comenzo a concentrar sus fuerzas para cometer la provocacion militar de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 En la decada de 1990, al dar su direccion de ataque principal de la estrategia de dominio mundial hacia la region de Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. definio la RPDC como primer blanco de la realizacion de la "estrategia de Asia Oriental" y modifico y completo de modo incesante y perfecciono los guiones de guerra contra la RPDC, entre otras "plan operacional 5027" y "plan operacion 5030".
					
					 Para llevarlos a la practica, aumento los modernos armamentos mortiferos que apuntaron a la RPDC, y desarrollo sin cesar las aventureras provocaciones militares y los ejercicios militares.
					
					 El numero publicado de los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC y los otros conjuntos militares desarrollados por EE.UU. en el Sur de Corea y sus contornos desde el cese de fuego hasta la fecha, llega a mas de 18 mil ocasiones.
					
					 Hoy la Peninsula Coreana esta en la situacion mas peligrosa en que pueda desencadenarse en cualquier tiempo la guerra nuclear, insiste la nota y sigue:
					
					 Por primera vez, la nacion coreana fue amenazada y chantajeada por las armas nucleares durante la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					 Truman, cabecillo de guerra de aquel entonces, intento en varias ocasiones lanzar la bomba atomica contra la RPDC a fin de evitar las grandes derrotas reiteradas en la guerra coreana.
					
					 Al cabo de amenazar y chantajear con las bombas atomicas a la nacion coreana, EE.UU. introdujo a fines de la decada de 1950 gran cantidad de armas nucleares al Sur de Corea.
					
					 Ya en la decada de 1970, convirtio la tierra surcoreana en una zona mas elevada en el mundo en la densidad de la ubicacion de las armas nucleares.
					
					 A principios de la decada de 1980 EE.UU. introdujo en el Sur de Corea hasta las bombas de neutrones (bomba N), reconocidas como "arma de diablo del siglo XX".
					
					 Tras convertir el territorio surcoreano en la mas avanzada base de ataque nuclear y en el arsenal nuclear, el imperio yanqui pretendio usar las armas nucleares de diversos tipos en la guerra agresiva contra la RPDC.
					
					 Todos los simulacros militares conjuntos librados desde la decada de 1960 hasta la hecha tales como "Focus Retina", "Freedom Bolt", "Team Spirit", "RSOI", "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" "Ulji Freedom Guardian" se desarrollaron para elevar la capacidad de guerra real nuclear.
					
					 Efectivamente, en varias oportunidades EE.UU. declaro sin vacilacion alguna que la RPDC, que antes no tenia armas nucleares, como objeto de ataque preventivo nuclear y ha venido tratando de usar las armas nucleares contra ella.
					
					 Hace poco, el imperio hizo publico el llamado "informe de revision sobre la estrategia de defensa de 4 anos" y definio  la RPDC como "pais directamente amenazador" y "enemigo mas peligroso". Y trata de "aplastar la RPDC con las fuerzas armadas nucleares" en el caso de que fracase la supuesta "estrategia del disuasivo". Asi demostro por si mismo a que etapa imprudente llego su ambicion de aplastamiento a la RPDC.
					
					 Hace unos dias, Obama cuestiono sin fundamento el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC sin decir ni una palabra de sus maniobras criminales como autor del surgimiento del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y del chantaje nuclear contra la RPDC. Y pronuncio las palabras provocativas como "seguira apretando al Norte (de Corea) por la desnuclearizacion", lo cual muestra otra vez la pretension del imperio de continuar la provocacion de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					 Despues de que se quedo invalida la organizacion de armisticio tuvieron lugar centenares de dialogos y contactos grandes y pequenos entre la capa militar RPDC-EE.UU., inclusive 16 dialogos a nivel del general y mas de 200 conversaciones de trabajo a nivel de primer coronel, pero debido a la actitud artificial e injusta de la parte norteamericana, la discusion del problema sobre el establecimiento de un nuevo sistema de garantia de paz no alcanzo ningun avance.
					
					 No pasa con palabras sino con castigo duro con EE.UU., que toma la agresion y guerra como modo de su existencia.
					
					 El ejercito y pueblo coreanos esperan solo el momento de liquidar todos los actos criminales de EE.UU. que pone la Peninsula Coreana en la crisis permanente de guerra nuclear e impone a la nacion coreana incontables desgracias y sufrimientos.

articles.title: CNCDP califica de crimen imperdonable la provocacion de guerra coreana
articles.content:
CNCDP califica de crimen imperdonable la provocacion de guerra coreana
 Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 25, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) califico de gran crimen imperdonable la provocacion de la pasada guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					 Instigando al traidor Syngman Rhee, el imperialismo norteamericano lanzo el 25 de junio de 1950 la invasion sorpresiva contra la RPDC y asesino salvajemente a los habitantes coreanos y redujo a escombros y cenizas el territorio coreano, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					 Murieron mas de un millon 200 mil habitantes inocentes y pacificos y el territorio norcoreano se ha convertido en las ruinas debido al indiscriminado lanzamiento de casi 600 mil toneladas de bombas, inclusive la Napalm.
					
					 La historia de la humanidad registra como crimen mas brutal las atrocidades perpetradas por la camarilla fascista de Hitler en el periodo de la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					 Pero, las barbaridades cometidas por los yanquis en la pasada guerra coreana fueron mas peores que las de los fascistas de Hitler.
					
					 Pero, los agresores no pudieron doblegar al heroico pueblo coreano levantado en la lucha de vida o muerte por defender la soberania del pais y se vieron obligados a firmar el acta de capitulacion arrodillandose ante el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					 En lugar de sacar las lecciones de la derrota en la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. trata de provocar la nueva guerra sin abandonar su ambicion de agredir a la RPDC.
					
					 Para colmo, EE.UU. y los gangsteres militares surcoreanos elogian sus crimenes de guerra tergiversando la pasada guerra coreana como la "guerra que disuadio la agresion al Sur del Norte de Corea".
					
					 Toda la nacion coreana del Norte y el Sur de Corea deben levantarse unanimemente en la sagrada lucha pannacional por castigar duro a EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana que traen a la patria el nubarron de guerra nuclear.
					
					 Las organizaciones internacionales inclusive la ONU y los pueblos amantes de la paz del mundo deben ver correctamente quien es el destructor de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y frustrar rotundamente el imprudente intento de los belicistas de desatar la guerra.
					
					 EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia dandose cuenta de las consecuencias destructivas de la segunda guerra coreana.
